scripts.build: npm run generate &>/dev/null;npm run build_may_fail &>/dev/null;npm run generate &>/dev/null;npm run build_may_fail
scripts.serve: export VUE_APP_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8000;npm run generate &>/dev/null;vue-cli-service serve --mode development &>/dev/null & pid=$!;sleep 20;kill -9 $pid;npm run generate &>/dev/null;npm run serve_may_fail
scripts.build_demo: npm run generate &>/dev/null;VUE_APP_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8000 npm run build &>/dev/null;npm run generate &>/dev/null;VUE_APP_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8000 npm run build
scripts.build_may_fail: vue-cli-service build;: 'may fail because intermediate generate,running twice fixes it.'
scripts.build_dev: npm run generate &>/dev/null;VUE_APP_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8000 npm run build_may_fail &>/dev/null;npm run generate &>/dev/null;VUE_APP_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8000 npm run build_may_fail
